row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source file/folder path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if missing" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Delete file name" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_NEW_FILE_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_TYPE@WINDOWS
if ($EXIST -eq 0) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File/directory &UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH# does not exist." :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : IF &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# = "YES" $errors = 1 : ELSE __uc_return(0) : ENDIF }
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Rename file/folder : '&UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH#' to '&UC4RB_NEW_FILE_NAME#'" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO Rename-Item -Force "&UC4RB_SOURCE_PATH#" "&UC4RB_NEW_FILE_NAME#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
